resources.string: 1.We all make choices in life, but in the end our choices make us.
2.The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
3.Wanting something does not give you the right to have it.
5.You canâ€™t break a man the way you break a dog, or a horse. The harder you beat a man, the taller he stands.
6.Dont wish it were easier, wish you were better.
7.Nothing is more badass than treating a woman with respect!
9.Hope is what makes us strong. It is why we are here. It is what we fight with when all else is lost.
10.What is a man but the sum of his memories? We are the stories we live! The tales we tell ourselves!
